author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
summary:
...HONE CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS...
 As of 2:00 PM HST Fri Aug 23
 the center of Hone was located near 16.8, -148.6
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
